en: Gain more EXP in battle when your level is lower than your enemy's.
Allies' HP recovers as you explore a dungeon.
Makes demon negotiation easier by lowering the rank of the demon's demands.
Increases HP healing effects for allies in battle.
Increases critical rate for allies' attacks.
Allies' HP recovers as you explore a dungeon.
Gain more EXP in battle when your level is lower than your enemy's.
Gain more EXP in battle when your level is lower than your enemy's.
Gain more EXP in battle when your level is lower than your enemy's.
Allies' MP recovers as you explore a dungeon.
Items and money are more frequently found during Demon Recon.
Demon allies heal you more often, and materials are more frequently found during Demon Recon.
Lowers the chance of being afflicted with any status ailment.
Allies' MP recovers as you explore a dungeon.
Allows you to see the resistance of one affinity for an enemy, minus that of a select few enemies.
Risky Enemies appear more often, and deal less damage for first 3 turns of battle.
Risky Enemies appear more often, and have weakened defenses for first turn of battle.
Risky Enemies appear more often, and your Aim/Dodge improves against them for first turn of battle.
Extends the effects of Map Skills.
Makes it harder for enemies to detect you while exploring a dungeon.
Recovers an ally's MP once during battle upon low MP.
Increases allies' hit rate. Multihit skills will often trigger more hits.
Makes it easier to scout demons during Demon Recon.
Strengthens allies' stats after 3 turns of battle have passed from the start of a battle.
Increases the likelihood of a tandem skill activating during a sabbath.
Increases the chance of encountering a rare enemy while exploring a dungeon.
Increases INT. The higher the original INT, the greater the increase.
